mapper.select: SELECT cr.cr_num, ur.ur_num, cr.buyer_num,pd.pd_name, ur.ur_id, cm.msg, sender, cm.cm_wdate, cm.is_read, ur_prf.prf_nick buyer_nick, ur_prf.prf_img buyer_img, ur_prf_seller.prf_nick seller_nick, ur_prf_seller.prf_img seller_img FROM cr join sp on sp.sp_num=cr.sp_num join pd on sp.pd_num=pd.pd_num join ur on sp.ur_num=ur.ur_num join ( select cm1.cm_num, cm1.cr_num,cm1.msg, cm1.cm_wdate, cm1.sender, cm1.is_read from cm as cm1, (select msg, cr_num, max(cm_wdate) as max_date from cm group by cr_num) as cm2 where cm1.cm_wdate = cm2.max_date ) as cm on cr.cr_num=cm.cr_num join ur_prf on ur_prf.ur_num=cr.buyer_num join ur_prf as ur_prf_seller on ur_prf_seller.ur_num=sp.ur_num where ur.ur_num=#{ur_num} or cr.buyer_num=#{ur_num} order by cm_wdate desc
